item.title: JavaScript Recap |
item.description:
JavaScript Quick Revision

Data Types and Variables

Keywords

There are certain reserved words which can’t be used as identifiers. They have pre defined meanings for example for,function,Object,Array,case,switch,—these are Keywords

item.title: Jekyll Site Generator |
item.description:
Jekyll static platform generator

Jekyll is a ruby based static site genarator .Now Jekyll is a part of github pages.Its a blog aware platform and many templates are freely available for rapid deployment of jekyll sites.
